method.name: set_disabled
method.description: In addition to persistently disabled components, dynamically disable these components. It will be taken into account by disabled() algorithm of Component class. This information is not committed to the database and will be overwritten by next set_disabled() call or erased by any config action (DB load, unload, reload).

method-implementation.prototype: void set_disabled(const std::set<const dunedaq::coredal::Component *>& objs) const

method.name: set_enabled
method.description: Dynamically enable these persistently disabled components. It will be taken into account by disabled() algorithm of the Component class. This information is not committed to the database and will be overwritten by next set_enabled() call or erased by any config action (DB load, unload, reload).
